testcase.name: As an user, I should be able to create a new user with entering valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed And Click on Log in link....................................................passed And Click on user name text box and type it "manager2"......................passed And Click on password name text box and type it "Man1ager2!"................passed And Click login button......................................................passed And click on ADD USER.......................................................passed And click on Username area and type invalid Username........................passed And click on Password area and type valid Password..........................passed And click on Email area and type valid email................................passed And click on Full Name area and type valid Full Name........................passed And click on Phone No area and type valid Phone No..........................passed And click on Social Security Number area and type valid Social Security Number.passed And click on Driving License area and type valid Driving License............passed And click on Country area and select valid Country.........................passed And click on State area and do not type any information.....................passed And click on Address area and type valid Address............................passed And click on Date of Birth area and type valid Date of Birth................passed And click on WorkingSector area and type valid WorkingSector................passed And click on Role area and select valid Role................................passed And click on Approved area and select Yes or No button......................passed And click save button.......................................................passed Then verify the message "You have some form errors. Please check below."....passed
